title: I Like Cute Ones!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Riko-chan, you dropped a book.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? KYAAAH!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Wow, what a pretty cover art!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>D-, don’t look–<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s so cute~ She looks just like Haruka-chan! Can Kanata borrow this book?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh, umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata likes books from Setsuna-chan and Hanamaru-chan, but cute illustrations like this are also great.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Is that so? Well, I have a few others I could show you if you want....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Really!? Yeah! Let me see~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Okay! I guess this one is cute. J-, just don’t look inside, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
